config.cookingforblockheads.allowVeryToa: Toasting toasted bread again will turn into charcoal (only if no other mod adding toast is present). Set to false to disable.
config.cookingforblockheads.compressedCo: Compressed Cow in a Jar Milk Multiplier
Ex Compressum compatibility. Multiplier applied to the milk per tick for Compressed Cow in a Jar.
config.cookingforblockheads.cowJarEnable: If true, a cow can be squished into a Milk Jar by dropping an anvil on top.
config.cookingforblockheads.cowJarMilkPe: Milk Generation per Tick in Jar
The amount of milk the cow in a jar generates per tick.
config.cookingforblockheads.disallowOven: Set this to true if you'd like to disallow automation of the oven (pipes and such won't be able to insert/extract)
config.cookingforblockheads.largeCounter: Enabling this will make the kitchen counters have twice as much inventory space.
config.cookingforblockheads.ovenCookTime: The cooking time multiplier for the cooking oven. Higher values means it will take longer.
config.cookingforblockheads.ovenFuelTime: The fuel multiplier for the cooking oven. Higher values means fuel lasts longer, 1.0 is furnace default.
config.cookingforblockheads.ovenRequires: Set this to true if you'd like the oven to only accept cooking oil as fuel (requires Pam's Harvestcraft)
config.cookingforblockheads.showIngredie: Set to false if you don't want ingredients to be marked with a special icon in the recipe book.
config.cookingforblockheads.sinkRequires: Set this to true if you'd like the sink to require water to be piped in, instead of providing infinite of it.
